verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.english: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, wata mudda ta zamani tã zo a kan mutum, bai kasance kõme ba wanda ake ambata.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.english: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ Mun halitta mutum daga ɗigon ruwa garwayayye, Muna jarraba shi, sabõda haka Muka sanya shi mai ji mai gani,

verses.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.english: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ, Mun shiryar da shi ga hanyar ƙwarai, ko ya zama mai gõdiya, kuma ko ya zama mai kãfirci.

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.english: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mũ, Mun yi tattali, dõmin kãfirai, sarƙoƙi da ƙuƙumma da sa'ĩr.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, mutãnen kirki zã su sha daga finjãlin giya abin gaurayarta yã kãsance kãfur ne.

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.english: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
verses.hausa: Wani marmaro ne, daga gare shi bayin Allah suke sha, suna ɓuɓɓugar da shi ɓuɓɓugarwa.

verses.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.english: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
verses.hausa: Suna cikãwa da alwãshin (da suka bãkanta), kuma suna tsõron wani yini wanda sharrinsa ya kasance mai tartsatsi ne.

verses.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.english: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
verses.hausa: Kuma suna ciyar da abinci, a kan suna bukãtarsa, ga matalauci da marãya da kãmamme.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.english: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
verses.hausa: (Suna cẽwa): "Munã ciyar da ku ne dõmin nẽman yardar Allah kawai, bã mu nufin sãmun wani sakamako daga gare ku, kuma bã mu nufin gõdiya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.english: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne, mũ muna tsõro daga Ubangijinmu, wani yini mai gintsẽwa, mai murtukẽwa."

verses.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.english: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka Allah Ya tsare musu sharrin wannan yini, kuma Ya hlɗa su da annũrin huska da farin ciki,

verses.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.english: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya sãka musu sabõda haƙurin da suka yi, da Aljanna da tufãfin alharini.

verses.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.english: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
verses.hausa: Sunã mãsu zaman ginciri, a cikinta, a kan karagu, bã su ganin rãnã a cikinta, kuma bã su ganin jaura.

verses.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.english: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
verses.hausa: Kuma, inuwõyinta suna kusa, a kansu, an hõre nunannun 'yã'yan itãcenta, hõrẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.english: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
verses.hausa: Kuma ana kẽwayãwa a kansu da finjãlai na azurfa da kofuna waɗanda suka kasance na ƙarau.

verses.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.english: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
verses.hausa: ¡arau na azurfa, sun ƙaddara su ƙaddarawa, daidai bukãta.

verses.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.english: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
verses.hausa: Ana shayarwa da su, a cikinta, finjalan giya, wadda abin gaurayarta ya kasance zanjabil ne.

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.english: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
verses.hausa: Wani marmaro ne, a cikinta, ana kiran sa salsabil.

verses.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.english: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
verses.hausa: Kuma wasu yara samãrin dindindin na kẽwayãwa, a kansu, idan ka gan su, zã ka zaci sũ lu'ulu'u ne wanda aka wãtsa.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.english: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan kã ga wannan wurin, to, kã ga wata irin ni'ima da mulki babba.

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.english: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
verses.hausa: Tufãfinsu na sama na alharĩ ni ne, kõre da mai walƙiya, kuma an ƙawãce su da mundãye na wata curin azurfa kuma Ubangijinsu, Ya shãyar da su abin sha mai tsarkakẽwar (ciki).

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.english: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
verses.hausa: (A ce musu) "Lalle ne, wannan ya kasance, a gare ku sakamako, kuma aikink. ya kasance abin gõdewa."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.english: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
verses.hausa: Lalle, Mũ ne Muka saukar da Alƙur'ãni a gare ka, saukarwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.english: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka ka yi haƙuri ga hukuncin Ubangijinka, kuma kada ka bi, daga cikinsu, mai zunubi ko mai kãfirci.

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.english: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ambaci sũnan Ubangijinka, sãfe da maraice.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.english: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
verses.hausa: Daga dare, sai ka yi sujũda gare Shi, kuma ka tsarkake Shi darẽ mai tsawo.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.english: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, waɗannan suna son mai gaugãwa (dũniya) kuma suna bari, a bãyansu, wani yini mai nauyi.

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.english: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
verses.hausa: Mũ ne Muka halitta su kuma Muka, ƙarfafa halittarsu, kuma idan Mun so, za Mu musanyâ su da wasu mutane kwatankwacinsu, musanyawa.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.english: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, wannan wata tunãtarwa ce, saboda wanda ya so ya riƙa hanyar kirki zuwa ga Ubangijinsa.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.english: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
verses.hausa: Kuma, bã zã ku so ba, sai Allah Ya so, lalle ne Allah Yã kasance Masani' Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.english: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Yana shigar da wanda Ya so a cikin rahamarsa, kuma azzãlumai, Yã yi musu tattalin wata azãba mai raɗaɗi.
